page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE - UNEMPLOYED 2
page.content: One of the biggest problems of being unemployed is the time I have on my hands. My wife is also at home in the day and so we tend to get on each others nerves. Because we've got no spare money we can't seem to get away from each other. I try to help around the house but I think she would prefer it if I left it to her. Most people are quite understanding about the problems we have but it is hard to get the kids to understand. They see their friends with new clothes and toys or going on holiday and they can't understand why they can't have the same. I worry about their future. What will it be like when they grow up if it is this bad now? The unemployment problem isn't being solved it is just getting worse.
